name: Memories of Love
description:
Short game about love
The web version is laggy(?) you can download the executable version instead (for windows)

128*128 game texture (https://lospec.com/i/19ds)

How to play :
Arrows to move or change dialogue options
Space to progress on the dialogue or choose dialogue options

Edit : Web version is fixed with deleting loading scene XD Enjoy the game XD
